title: Homepage Stats Dashboard Load
description: Verify that the homepage loads the Stats Dashboard showing global blockchain metrics and search bar successfully with accurate real-time data.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage
Check that StatsDashboard component is rendered
Verify real-time network metrics such as TPS, active users, blocks, and transaction volumes are displayed
Verify global search bar is present and responsive
Verify loading skeleton is shown during data fetch

title: Global Search Functionality Valid Query
description: Verify global search returns correct filtered results for blocks, transactions, accounts, and contracts given valid queries.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage
Enter a valid block ID in the global search bar and submit
Verify blocks list filtered and relevant block(s) displayed
Enter a valid transaction hash and submit
Verify transactions list filtered and relevant transaction(s) shown
Enter a valid account address and submit
Verify accounts list filtered and relevant account(s) displayed
Enter a valid smart contract ID and submit
Verify contracts list filtered and relevant contract(s) displayed

title: Global Search Functionality Invalid Query
description: Verify global search handles invalid or empty queries gracefully and returns appropriate messages.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage
Enter an invalid query string with unsupported characters and submit
Verify appropriate error or no results message is shown without UI breakage
Enter an empty string and submit
Verify system prompts user to enter a query or shows no results

title: Blocks List Pagination and Filtering
description: Verify blocks list page fetches paginated data, applies client-side filtering and sorting correctly, and handles edge cases.

steps.description: Navigate to /blocks page
Verify paginated list of blocks is displayed with default page
Click pagination next page and verify new set of blocks are displayed
Apply filter criteria (e.g., block height range) and verify filtered blocks
Verify filtering updates block list without inconsistencies
Test case with no matching blocks for a filter and verify empty state is shown gracefully

title: Block Detail View and Metadata Verification
description: Verify block detail pages show full metadata, transaction/event lists, QR code generation, and related links correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to a valid block detail page /blocks/[id]
Verify display of complete block metadata (height, timestamp, transactions, etc.)
Verify transaction list within block is shown with pagination if needed
Verify QR code representing block ID is rendered correctly
Verify related links (e.g., previous/next blocks) are functional

title: Transaction Detail View and Validation
description: Verify transaction detail page displays all metadata, transaction types, raw JSON data, and related details accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to a valid transaction detail page /transactions/[id]
Verify transaction metadata and type are displayed clearly
Verify raw JSON data of transaction is available for developer analysis
Verify related blockchain links (block and involved accounts) are displayed

title: Smart Contract Explorer Read/Write Operations
description: Verify smart contract explorer page shows contract code, event history, and supports read/write interaction with correct validations and secure communication.

steps.description: Navigate to a valid smart contract detail page /contracts/[id]
Verify smart contract code is displayed in readable format
Verify list of contract-related events and transactions is shown
Perform read operations on allowed contract functions
Verify read results are correct and consistent
Perform write operations with valid inputs
Verify write transaction is sent correctly and error handled if any issues
Attempt write operation with invalid inputs
Verify robust input validation blocks invalid requests and shows meaningful error messages

title: Wallet Integration Connection Management
description: Verify wallet connection lifecycle with Ikarus wallet extension including detection, connection, disconnection, state management, and error handling.

steps.description: Load app with Ikarus wallet extension installed
Verify wallet installation is detected and user prompted to connect
Connect to the wallet using UI button
Verify public key is retrieved and connection state is updated
Send a valid PostMessage request to wallet and verify message handling
Verify wallet responds and errors are logged if any
Disconnect wallet
Verify connection state resets and UI updates accordingly
Load app without wallet extension installed
Verify user is informed wallet extension is missing

title: API Routes Input Validation and Error Handling
description: Verify that all Next.js API routes validate input parameters strictly, return appropriate HTTP status codes and error messages for invalid inputs.

steps.description: Make API request to /api/blocks with valid pagination parameters
Verify HTTP 200 response with valid paginated data
Make API request to /api/blocks with invalid pagination parameters (e.g., negative page)
Verify HTTP 400 response with descriptive validation error message
Make API request to /api/transactions/[id] with a non-existent ID
Verify HTTP 404 response indicating resource not found
Make API request with unsupported HTTP method
Verify HTTP 405 Method Not Allowed response

title: Structured Logging on Errors and Wallet Interaction
description: Verify structured logging captures relevant error, warning, and event data from wallet communication and application API layers.

steps.description: Trigger an API route error by sending invalid input
Verify logs contain structured and detailed error information including timestamp and request context
Cause wallet communication error (e.g., send invalid PostMessage)
Verify wallet interaction error is logged with details
Review logs for successful events to verify structured logging format

title: UI Loading States and Error Display
description: Verify UI components display loading skeletons during data fetch and show consistent, user-friendly error messages on failure.

steps.description: Navigate to heavy data pages (e.g., blocks list) with slow network simulation
Verify loading skeleton is shown while data loads
Simulate API failure and navigate to affected page
Verify error message is displayed gracefully without UI breakage
Verify date/time formats use relative time strings consistently

title: Performance Benchmark Verification
description: Verify page load times are under 2 seconds, API responses under 500ms, and chart components render within 1 second under normal network conditions.

steps.description: Measure time to fully load homepage
Verify page load time is less than 2 seconds
Make API calls to fetch blocks and transactions lists
Verify API response times are under 500ms
Render charts on dashboard
Verify chart components render fully within 1 second

title: Security Headers and Input Sanitization
description: Verify security HTTP headers are enforced and all user inputs are sanitized to prevent XSS, clickjacking, MIME sniffing vulnerabilities.

steps.description: Inspect HTTP response headers for security policies (Content-Security-Policy, X-Frame-Options, X-Content-Type-Options)
Verify security headers are present and correctly configured
Input malicious script tags and SQL-like payloads into search and form inputs
Verify inputs are sanitized and application resists injection/XSS attacks

title: Pagination and Filtering Edge Cases
description: Verify pagination and filtering components handle edge conditions such as empty results, very large datasets, and invalid page numbers correctly.

steps.description: Apply filters that result in zero matching records
Verify empty state message and no UI errors occur
Navigate to page numbers beyond last page
Verify system gracefully handles out-of-range pages by redirecting or showing no results message
Test with extremely large data sets for sorting and pagination
Verify data consistency and no performance degradation or crashes

title: Placeholder Pages Accessibility and Content
description: Verify placeholder pages for Developers, Knowledge, and Nodes display 'Coming Soon' message and do not break app layout.

steps.description: Navigate to placeholder routes such as /developers, /knowledge, /nodes
Verify 'Coming Soon' text is displayed clearly
Verify no broken UI elements or JavaScript errors occur
